item.title: Switched from PC to Mac
item.author: jason@jjasonclark.com (Jason Clark)
item.description: I'm a switcher! I switched from PC to Mac. It started when I wanted to replace the computer I use to run my TV. I picked the Mac Mini because of it's size. I had done the research and all of the Internet services I used on the PC also worked for the Mac. So I waited until the Mac OS X Lion update came out to buy the newest version of the mini.
